titleStmt.title: Minucius Felix his dialogne [sic] called Octavius Containing a defence of Christian religion. Translated by Richard Iames of C.C.C. Oxon.
Octavius. English
titleStmt.author: Minucius Felix, Marcus.
James, Richard, 1592-1638.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Leonard Lichfield, for Thomas Huggins,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: M. Minucius Felix his Octavius.
With six final leaves of verse; the three last leaves are blank.
Identified as STC 17953a on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
